description: Check the availability of a resource name. This is needed for resources where name is globally unique, such as a CDN endpoint.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2017-04-02.

message.description: The detailed error message describing why the name is not available.

nameavailable.description: Indicates whether the name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the name is not available.
